column5: Cliff Top  This one bedroom bungalow affords guests all the amenities of Fort Worth city life, without the pace of the city. Perched on top of a bluff overlooking scenic Lake Worth, guests have access to a private deck and perhaps the greatest view in Fort Worth. Equipped with a queen bed and pull-out couch.  My place is close to Lake Worth, Eagle Mountain Lake, Fort Worth Nature Preserve, parks, dining, lakes, and is a 20-minute drive from Downtown Fort Worth and 15 minutes from Stockyards.
